about_the_game:
Show your support for the Capcom Pro Tour with the Capcom Pro Tour 2019 Premier Pass.

Includes the following contents:
- CPT 2019 costumes for: Kage, Sagat and Champion's Choice Costume for Rashid
- EX08 colors for the original and S1-4 characters' default costumes.
- 'Ring of Justice' stage
- 5 Special In-Game Titles
- 2 CPT 2019 Fighter Profile Themes
- 10,000 Fight Money

*The costumes and stage included in this bundle can be purchased individually. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
*In order to use the CPT 2019 costumes and CPT: 2019 Premier Pass EX08 colors, you will also need access to the characters.
*The EX08 colors, in-game titles and fighter profile themes are limited content only available in the CPT: 2019 Premier Pass. These contents are not available for purchase individually.
*In order to use this content, it is required to have the base game which is sold separately. Also, please make sure to update when it is required to apply the latest patch.
detailed_description:
Show your support for the Capcom Pro Tour with the Capcom Pro Tour 2019 Premier Pass.

Includes the following contents:
- CPT 2019 costumes for: Kage, Sagat and Champion's Choice Costume for Rashid
- EX08 colors for the original and S1-4 characters' default costumes.
- 'Ring of Justice' stage
- 5 Special In-Game Titles
- 2 CPT 2019 Fighter Profile Themes
- 10,000 Fight Money

*The costumes and stage included in this bundle can be purchased individually. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
*In order to use the CPT 2019 costumes and CPT: 2019 Premier Pass EX08 colors, you will also need access to the characters.
*The EX08 colors, in-game titles and fighter profile themes are limited content only available in the CPT: 2019 Premier Pass. These contents are not available for purchase individually.
*In order to use this content, it is required to have the base game which is sold separately. Also, please make sure to update when it is required to apply the latest patch.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 480, GTX 570, GTX 670, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with XInput and DirectInput USB devices including gamepads and arcade sticks based on Xbox 360, Xbox One, and DualShock controllers. Steam Controller also supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K @3.50GHz or AMD FX-9370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with XInput and DirectInput USB devices including gamepads and arcade sticks based on Xbox 360, Xbox One, and DualShock controllers. Steam Controller also supported.
